summary: Anita is a girl of only teenage years, and while she has developed early physically, to a mature woman, she is emotionally struggling. Her relationship with her parents and her friends is ... See full summary »
cast: Christina Lindberg|Stellan Skarsgård|Danièle Vlaminck|Michel David|Erika Wickman|Ewert Granholm|Arne Ragneborn|Per Mattsson|Jörgen Barwe|Jan-Olof Rydqvist|Thore Segelström|Berit Agedal|Christer Jonsson|Lasse Lundberg
title: Anita
